definitions: relating to or involving the branch of physics that deals with the production and effects of very low temperatures
shortDefinitions: relating to or involving branch of physics that deals with production and effects of very low temperatures

definitions: relating to the deep-freezing of the bodies of people who have just died, in the hope that scientific advances may allow them to be revived in the future

examples.text: a body being prepared for cryogenic preservation

shortDefinitions: relating to deep-freezing of bodies in hope of future revival
